Package de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.opt

General classes for command line options parsing.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CliOptions
    Describes the interface for all necessary command line options.
    LongOptions
    Declares the multi character switches.
    OptionDescriptions
    Declares all options description texts.
    ShortOptions
    Declares the single character switches.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CliOptionsImplementation
    Holds the given command line arguments.
    OptionsSetup
    Abstract base setup for command line option parsing.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    OptionDescriptor  
    Strategy
    Enumerates the implementation strategies for command line parsing.

Package de.weltraumschaf.groundzero.opt Description

General classes for command line options parsing.
